籤詩版本二:
Chisangalalo pamaso panga sichisangalalo, komanso sichikhala chodetsa nkhawa nthawi zangozi.
N'chifukwa chiyani kuli koyenera kudula mnofu kuti muchiritse zilonda?
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ili ngati kudula mnofu kukhala zilonda.
Zinthu zonse ziyenera kuchitika munthawi yake.
解曰: Ngati mukudziwa kuyimitsa, siyani. Dziwani momwe mungadzikhululukire nokha. Dulani thupi lanu. General ululu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Sun Bin watsekeredwa ndipo Pang Juan watsekeredwa
Munthawi ya Nkhondo za States, Sun Bin anali mbadwa ya Qi. Pang Juan anali mbadwa ya Wei. Ankalambiranso Gui Guzi monga mphunzitsi wake.
Sun Bin anali wokhoza kuphunzira kuposa Pang Juan.Pang Juan pamene anali mkulu wa asilikali m’chigawo cha Wei, anamenyana ndi Sun Bin pankhondo yanzeru ndipo ankadana ndi Sun Bin atagonja.
Anagwiritsa ntchito chinyengo kuti amudule mapazi a Sun Bin, kenako Sun Bin anakhala ngati wamisala ndipo anatha kuthawa.
King Wei wa Qi adagwiritsa ntchito Sun Bin ngati mlangizi wake wankhondo. Atsogolereni ankhondo kuti akaukire Wei.
Sun Bin adagwiritsa ntchito njira yodzinamizira kuchepetsa mphamvu za adani ndikuwonjezera ankhondo ake mwachinsinsi. Ananyenga Pang Juan ndikumuthamangitsira ku Maling Road. Anamuombera ndi mfuti msilikali yemwe ankamuzembera ndi uta.
聖意: Kusakhazikika panyumba, kudzilankhula, kufunafuna chuma, bizinesi yosasangalatsa, ukwati wa munthu woipa sukhalitsa, Liujia, anthu otsekereza minda, kuwononga mbozi za silika, kuwononga ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, kufunafuna anthu, milandu yosakhala pagulu, kutayika, kusamuka, kusakonda, kutayika. katundu, zovuta kuzipeza, matenda, manda a mapiri obwerezedwa, zosayenera
古人: Sun Bin watsekeredwa ndipo Pang Juan watsekeredwa
第X籤: Chizindikiro cha makumi asanu ndi limodzi mphambu zisanu
